description: Try our easy to follow Tropical Fruit Punch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tropical Fruit Punch Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup fresh fruit, chopped (strawberries, passionfruit pulp, rockmelon or paw paw)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 1 or 2 slices from the pineapple, cut into wedges and reserve. Peel pineapple, cut into quarters and remove core. Roughly chop, reserving about 1 cup of the pieces. Blend or juice remaining pineapple until smooth.
Combine pineapple and orange juices in a large jug. Add chopped fruit including the reserved chopped pineapple and mint leaves.
Stir in lemonade and ice and serve in glasses garnished with the reserved pineapple wedges.
